name: ALPHA - the game
description:
I CHALENGE YOU TO DOWNLOAD THIS - YOU WILL BE SURPRISED

the only game you can actualy skip the introduction.....

did you want to feel like a alpha tester? Did you ever played a game trying to find the bugs? this game is for you!

It is actualy a experiment made by me, ever time when you die or close the game or pass the level by other hays, this game can changes, find the bugs and discover other ways to pass is real fun...  

___________CONTROLS___________

esc = close

A-W-S-D = movment

E = ? 

___________CONTROLS___________
